name: ClimateChangeAction
0:
”Alexa, ask climate change action how to get involved”
”Alexa, ask climate change action how to take action”
”Alexa, ask climate change action how to get involved with climate change”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate change action
des: Ask Alexa on how to take action on climate change! Just say, "Alexa, ask climate change action how to get involved". Alexa will tell you one simple way on how to take action on climate change.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
